call.sql: SELECT ORGANIZATION_CODE, BATCH_ID, PLANT_CODE, BATCH_NO, BATCH_TYPE, RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_VERSION, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_CMPLT_DATE, DUE_DATE, BATCH_STATUS, PARENT_BATCH, ACTUAL_START_DATE, ACTUAL_COMPLETION_DATE, BATCH_CLOSE_DATE, UPDATE_INVENTORY, FORMULA_NUMBER, FORMULA_VERSION, ROUTING_NUMBER, ROUTING_VERSION, RECIPE, FORMULA_DESCRIPTION, ROUTING_DESCRIPTION, FPO_ID, ENFORCE_STEP_DEPENDENCY, AUTOMATIC_STEP_CALCULATION, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE_1, ATTRIBUTE_2, ATTRIBUTE_3, ATTRIBUTE_4, ATTRIBUTE_5, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDTAED_BY, REQUEST_ID, PROCESS_STATUS, PROCESS_BATCH_ID FROM XXNUC_GME_BATCH_HEADER_STG WHERE PROCESS_BATCH_ID = #ProcessBatchId
